com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces

接口 IBluetoothReader

  • 所有超级接口:
    IReader
    所有已知子接口:
    IUhfBle
    所有已知实现类:
    BluetoothReader, BluetoothReader_qcom, RFIDWithUHFBLE, RFIDWithUHFBLE_qcom, RFIDWithUHFBLEN51_qcom, RFIDWithUHFBLEN52_qcom

    public interface IBluetoothReader
extends IReader
    蓝牙读写器的接口
    Interface of Bluetooth reader.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        boolean init(Context context)
        初始化蓝牙相关的服务(Intialize Bluetooth services)
        参数:
        context - context
        返回:
        true:成功(success) false:失败(failure)

      • free

        boolean free()
        释放蓝牙相关的资源(free Bluetooth resources)
        返回:
        true:成功(success) false:失败(failure)

      • startScanBTDevices

        void startScanBTDevices(ScanBTCallback scanBTCallback)
        扫描蓝牙设备(scanning Bluetooth devices)
        参数:
        scanBTCallback - 扫描结果回调(scanning result call back)

      • stopScanBTDevices

        void stopScanBTDevices()
        停止扫描蓝牙设备(Stop scanning Bluetooth devices)

      • setConnectionStatusCallback

        void setConnectionStatusCallback(ConnectionStatusCallback<java.lang.Object> btStatusCallback)
        设置蓝牙连接状态的回调(Setup Bluetooth connection status call back)
        参数:
        btStatusCallback - 蓝牙连接状态回调接口(Bluetooth connection status call back)

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String address)
        连接蓝牙(Connect Bluetooth)
        参数:
        address - 蓝牙地址(Bluetooth address)

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String address,
             ConnectionStatusCallback<java.lang.Object> btStatusCallback)

      • setRemoteBluetoothName

        boolean setRemoteBluetoothName(java.lang.String name)
        修改蓝牙名称(Change Bluetooth device Name)
        参数:
        name - 新的蓝牙名称(New Bluetooth name)
        返回:
        true:成功(success) false:失败(failure)

      • getBluetoothVersion

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBluetoothVersion()
        获取蓝牙版本号(acquire Bluetooth version)
        返回:
        key:VERSION_BT_FIRMWARE 表示固件版本(Firmware Version), key:VERSION_BT_HARDWARE 表示硬件版本(Hardware version) ， key:VERSION_BT_SOFTWARE 表示软件版本(software version)

      • getBleHardwareVersion

        java.lang.String getBleHardwareVersion()
